dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 26 Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
ArticleInsider.com
5/9/2005
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc. 
[private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private] 
Fax: [private]
Attn: [private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Incident#1

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the article "We Can Teach You a Lot about Phone Service Plans" by Chez Shadman posted on the Article Insider web site at http://phoneservices.articleinsider.com/33482_phone_service.html
Search Query: You know what you want and that's why you've come to this website." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.accxx-sales.com/Phone-Service.html
My email: [private]@infosearchmediacom 			Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]
